CheckTitle: Check if OpenSearch Service (previously called Elasticsearch) nodes are encrypted end to end.
Description: Check if OpenSearch Service (previously called Elasticsearch) nodes are encrypted end to end. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the node-to-node encryption is not enabled on the domain.

Recommendation.Text: enforce in-transit encryption in order to protect your OpenSearch data from unauthorized access and fulfill compliance requirements for data encryption within your organization
